title: What Does AMOSC Mean on Social Media?

steps.title: AMOSC is an abbreviation for "Add Me on Snapchat."
steps.content: AMOSC is an abbreviation for "Add Me on Snapchat." People use AMOSC on TikTok, Instagram, Tinder, and other social media platforms when they want people to add them on Snapchat. It’s basically an open invite to be Snapchat friends with other users. [1] X Research source You may also see AMOSC spelled as AMOS. A less common use for AMOSC is an organization called the Australian Marine Oil Spill Centre. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Add AMOSC into the bio of a dating profile.
steps.content: Add AMOSC into the bio of a dating profile. You may have heard the phrase, "A picture is worth a thousand words." Snapchat offers users a way to skip the small talk and get to know someone through pictures or videos. For people looking for love online, it may be a better tactic than exchanging dry messages back and forth. You can add text to each photo, send cute short videos, bitmojis, or text. An example bio could say, "Desk worker by day. Partier by night. I like exploring new dive bars and clubs and snapping pictures under the neon lights. If you're looking for a good time, amosc: @neonight123"

steps.title: Include #AMOSC in a caption or tweet on social media.
steps.content: Include #AMOSC in a caption or tweet on social media. An easy way to make new friends on Snapchat is by posting on other social media platforms like Instagram or Twitter. Add a hashtag to show up in people's search results, and you may find yourself lucky enough to make a new friend or two! You could write, "Bored. Send me pictures of your pets! #Amosc animalluverx12 Always use caution when adding people you don't know. If you ever feel uncomfortable with something someone sends you, block them on Snapchat by tapping the chat icon. Hold the user's name. Click "Manage Friendship" → "Block."

steps.title: Type someone's username or display name into the search bar.
steps.content: Type someone's username or display name into the search bar. You get two names on Snapchat: a username and a display name. The username is permanent when you make your Snapchat; however, you can change your display name anytime. Type the person’s username into the search bar and wait for their profile to pop up.

steps.title: Press the “Add” button on the right of the username.
steps.content: Press the “Add” button on the right of the username. To add someone on Snapchat tap the “Add” button beside their username. It will send them a friend request. You’ll have to wait for the other person to accept your friend request before you can start snapping!

steps.title: Download and create a Snapchat account.
steps.content: Download and create a Snapchat account. Go to the App or Play Store on your mobile device or tablet. Search "Snapchat" and hit "Install." Open the app and tap "Sign Up" to create a new Snapchat account . Enter your name and birthday, and create a unique username and password. Verify your account through your phone number or email. Then, you're ready to add friends using the methods above! [3] X Research source

steps.title: Use the Chat Screen to communicate with friends.
steps.content: Use the Chat Screen to communicate with friends. The Chat Screen is also your Friends List, and your friends show up based on who you keep in touch with the most or who reached out most recently. Here, you can tap on people's icons to start a chat, watch or send a snap, or make voice or video calls. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Manage your account with the Profile Screen.
steps.content: Manage your account with the Profile Screen. Tap your profile icon in the top left corner of the map. Here, you can access your Snapcode, find friends, manage your public profile, and more. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Use the camera to send new snaps to friends, groups, or stories.
steps.content: Use the camera to send new snaps to friends, groups, or stories. Whether you want to capture a beautiful sunset or send your friend a video of you dancing to the latest TikTok sound, tap the center button on Snapchat (which looks like a camera). Hold the bottom of the screen to toggle between different filters to add flair to your photos or videos. You can also utilize the vertical menu on the right of the screen to play with music, videos, night vision, and more. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Swipe left to open the Stories Screen.
steps.content: Swipe left to open the Stories Screen. If you're ever bored of scrolling on Instagram, TikTok, or X (Twitter), check out the latest using the Stories Screen. You can see what your friends are up to or subscribe to other influencers or celebrities. There are also public and popular stories for your casual viewing. [7] X Research source If you swipe once more, you can discover the world of Snapchat by checking out the Spotlights tab. This is where you can discover new users and add them to your favorites for more personalized story feeds.
